00036 #include "PACC/Threading/Mutex.hpp"
00037 #include "PACC/config.hpp"
00038 
00039 #ifdef PACC_THREADS_WIN32
00040 #include <windows.h>
00041 typedef HANDLE pthread_mutex_t;
00042 #else
00043 #include <pthread.h>
00044 #include <sys/errno.h>
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 using namespace PACC;
00048 
00053 Threading::Mutex::Mutex(void)
00054 {
00055     pthread_mutex_t* lMutex = new pthread_mutex_t;
00056 #ifdef PACC_THREADS_WIN32
00057     if((*lMutex = ::CreateMutex(0, 0, 0)) == 0)
00058 #else
00059         if(::pthread_mutex_init(lMutex, 0))
00060 #endif
00061             throw Exception(eOtherError, "Mutex::Mutex() can't create!");
00062     mMutex = lMutex;
00063 }
00064 
00066 Threading::Mutex::~Mutex(void)
00067 {
00068     pthread_mutex_t* lMutex = (pthread_mutex_t*) mMutex;
00069 #ifdef PACC_THREADS_WIN32
00070     while(::CloseHandle(*lMutex) == 0)
00071 #else
00072         while(::pthread_mutex_destroy(lMutex) == EBUSY)
00073 #endif
00074         {
00075             // wait for mutex to unlock
00076             lock();
00077             unlock();
00078         }
00079             delete lMutex;
00080     mMutex = 0;
00081 }
00082 
00087 void Threading::Mutex::lock(void) const
00088 {
00089     pthread_mutex_t* lMutex = (pthread_mutex_t*) mMutex;
00090 #ifdef PACC_THREADS_WIN32
00091     if(::WaitForSingleObject(*lMutex, INFINITE) != WAIT_OBJECT_0)
00092 #else
00093         if(::pthread_mutex_lock(lMutex) != 0) 
00094 #endif
00095             throw Exception(eWouldDeadLock, "Mutex::lock() can't lock!");
00096 }
00097 
00104 bool Threading::Mutex::tryLock(void) const
00105 {
00106     pthread_mutex_t* lMutex = (pthread_mutex_t*) mMutex;
00107 #ifdef PACC_THREADS_WIN32
00108     int lValue = ::WaitForSingleObject(*lMutex, 0);
00109     if(lValue == WAIT_TIMEOUT) return false;
00110     if(lValue != WAIT_OBJECT_0)
00111 #else
00112         int lValue = ::pthread_mutex_trylock(lMutex);
00113     if(lValue == EBUSY) return false;
00114     if(lValue != 0) 
00115 #endif
00116         throw Exception(eOtherError, "Mutex::trylock() can't trylock!");
00117     return true;
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00125 void Threading::Mutex::unlock(void) const
00126 {
00127     pthread_mutex_t* lMutex = (pthread_mutex_t*) mMutex;
00128 #ifdef PACC_THREADS_WIN32
00129     if(::ReleaseMutex(*lMutex) == 0)
00130 #else
00131         if(::pthread_mutex_unlock(lMutex) != 0)
00132 #endif
00133             throw Exception(eMutexNotOwned, "Mutex::unlock() can't unlock!");
00134 }
